verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto me,<WH413> saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> against<WH413> Gog,<WH1463> the land<WH776> of Magog,<WH4031> the chief<WH7218> prince<WH5387> of Meshech<WH4902> and Tubal,<WH8422> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> him,
And say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH413> thee, O Gog,<WH1463> the chief<WH7218> prince<WH5387> of Meshech<WH4902> and Tubal: <WH8422>

And I will turn thee back,<WH7725> and put<WH5414> hooks<WH2397> into thy jaws,<WH3895> and I will bring thee forth,<WH3318> <WH853> and all<WH3605> thine army,<WH2428> horses<WH5483> and horsemen,<WH6571> all<WH3605> of them clothed<WH3847> with all sorts<WH4358> of armor, even a great<WH7227> company<WH6951> with bucklers<WH6793> and shields,<WH4043> all<WH3605> of them handling<WH8610> swords: <WH2719>
Persia, <WH6539> Ethiopia,<WH3568> and Libya<WH6316> with<WH854> them; all<WH3605> of them with shield<WH4043> and helmet: <WH3553>

Gomer, <WH1586> and all<WH3605> his bands;<WH102> the house<WH1004> of Togarmah<WH8425> of the north<WH6828> quarters,<WH3411> and all<WH3605> his bands:<WH102> and many<WH7227> people<WH5971> with<WH854> thee.

Be thou prepared,<WH3559> and prepare<WH3559> for thyself, thou,<WH859> and all<WH3605> thy company<WH6951> that are assembled<WH6950> unto<WH5921> thee, and be<WH1961> thou a guard<WH4929> unto them.

After many<WH7227> days<WH4480> <WH3117> thou shalt be visited:<WH6485> in the latter<WH319> years<WH8141> thou shalt come<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH776> that is brought back<WH7725> from the sword,<WH4480> <WH2719> and is gathered<WH6908> out of many<WH7227> people,<WH4480> <WH5971> against<WH5921> the mountains<WH2022> of Israel,<WH3478> which<WH834> have been<WH1961> always<WH8548> waste:<WH2723> but it<WH1931> is brought forth<WH3318> out of the nations,<WH4480> <WH5971> and they shall dwell<WH3427> safely<WH983> all<WH3605> of them.

Thou shalt ascend<WH5927> and come<WH935> like a storm,<WH7722> thou shalt be<WH1961> like a cloud<WH6051> to cover<WH3680> the land,<WH776> thou,<WH859> and all<WH3605> thy bands,<WH102> and many<WH7227> people<WH5971> with<WH854> thee.

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> It shall also come to pass,<WH1961> that at the same<WH1931> time<WH3117> shall things<WH1697> come<WH5927> into<WH5921> thy mind,<WH3824> and thou shalt think<WH2803> an evil<WH7451> thought: <WH4284>

And thou shalt say,<WH559> I will go up<WH5927> to<WH5921> the land<WH776> of unwalled villages;<WH6519> I will go<WH935> to them that are at rest,<WH8252> that dwell<WH3427> safely,<WH983> all<WH3605> of them dwelling<WH3427> without<WH369> walls,<WH2346> and having neither<WH369> bars<WH1280> nor gates,<WH1817>

To take<WH7997> a spoil,<WH7998> and to take<WH962> a prey;<WH957> to turn<WH7725> thine hand<WH3027> upon<WH5921> the desolate places<WH2723> that are now inhabited,<WH3427> and upon<WH413> the people<WH5971> that are gathered<WH622> out of the nations,<WH4480> <WH1471> which have gotten<WH6213> cattle<WH4735> and goods,<WH7075> that dwell<WH3427> in<WH5921> the midst<WH2872> of the land.<WH776>

Sheba, <WH7614> and Dedan,<WH1719> and the merchants<WH5503> of Tarshish,<WH8659> with all<WH3605> the young lions<WH3715> thereof, shall say<WH559> unto thee, Art thou<WH859> come<WH935> to take<WH7997> a spoil?<WH7998> hast thou gathered<WH6950> thy company<WH6951> to take<WH962> a prey?<WH957> to carry away<WH5375> silver<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> to take away<WH3947> cattle<WH4735> and goods,<WH7075> to take<WH7997> a great<WH1419> spoil?<WH7998>

Therefore, <WH3651> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> and say<WH559> unto Gog,<WH1463> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> when my people<WH5971> of Israel<WH3478> dwelleth<WH3427> safely,<WH983> shalt thou not<WH3808> know<WH3045> it?

And thou shalt come<WH935> from thy place<WH4480> <WH4725> out of the north<WH6828> parts,<WH4480> <WH3411> thou,<WH859> and many<WH7227> people<WH5971> with<WH854> thee, all<WH3605> of them riding<WH7392> upon horses,<WH5483> a great<WH1419> company,<WH6951> and a mighty<WH7227> army: <WH2428>

And thou shalt come up<WH5927> against<WH5921> my people<WH5971> of Israel,<WH3478> as a cloud<WH6051> to cover<WH3680> the land;<WH776> it shall be<WH1961> in the latter<WH319> days,<WH3117> and I will bring<WH935> thee against<WH5921> my land,<WH776> that<WH4616> the heathen<WH1471> may know<WH3045> me, when I shall be sanctified<WH6942> in thee, O Gog,<WH1463> before their eyes.<WH5869>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Art thou<WH859> he<WH1931> of whom<WH834> I have spoken<WH1696> in old<WH6931> time<WH3117> by<WH3027> my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030> of Israel,<WH3478> which prophesied<WH5012> in those<WH1992> days<WH3117> many years<WH8141> that I would bring<WH935> thee against<WH5921> them?

And it shall come to pass<WH1961> at the same<WH1931> time<WH3117> when<WH3117> Gog<WH1463> shall come<WH935> against<WH5921> the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> that my fury<WH2534> shall come up<WH5927> in my face.<WH639>

For in my jealousy<WH7068> and in the fire<WH784> of my wrath<WH5678> have I spoken,<WH1696> Surely<WH518> <WH3808> in that<WH1931> day<WH3117> there shall be<WH1961> a great<WH1419> shaking<WH7494> in<WH5921> the land<WH127> of Israel;<WH3478>

So that the fishes<WH1709> of the sea,<WH3220> and the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven,<WH8064> and the beasts<WH2416> of the field,<WH7704> and all<WH3605> creeping things<WH7431> that creep<WH7430> upon<WH5921> the earth,<WH127> and all<WH3605> the men<WH120> that<WH834> are upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the earth,<WH127> shall shake<WH7493> at my presence,<WH4480> <WH6440> and the mountains<WH2022> shall be thrown down,<WH2040> and the steep places<WH4095> shall fall,<WH5307> and every<WH3605> wall<WH2346> shall fall<WH5307> to the ground.<WH776>

And I will call for<WH7121> a sword<WH2719> against<WH5921> him throughout all<WH3605> my mountains,<WH2022> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD:<WH3069> every man's<WH376> sword<WH2719> shall be<WH1961> against his brother.<WH251>

And I will plead<WH8199> against<WH854> him with pestilence<WH1698> and with blood;<WH1818> and I will rain<WH4305> upon<WH5921> him, and upon<WH5921> his bands,<WH102> and upon<WH5921> the many<WH7227> people<WH5971> that<WH834> are with<WH854> him, an overflowing<WH7857> rain,<WH1653> and great hailstones,<WH68> <WH417> fire,<WH784> and brimstone.<WH1614>

Thus will I magnify myself,<WH1431> and sanctify myself;<WH6942> and I will be known<WH3045> in the eyes<WH5869> of many<WH7227> nations,<WH1471> and they shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
